void_sword.name: Void Sword
void_sword.description: Wield the Void Sword to summon a mystical void shield, absorbing incoming attacks and unleashing a devastating explosion when the shield is depleted.

special_perk.name: Void Shield
special_perk.description: Summons a void shield that absorbs damage and releases a void explosion when depleted.

abyssal_dagger.name: Abyssal Dagger
abyssal_dagger.description: The Abyssal Dagger overflows with void energy, causing enemies to explode in a violent eruption upon their demise.

special_perk.name: Void Overload
special_perk.description: Overloads enemies with void energy, causing them to explode on death.

voidblade.name: Voidblade
voidblade.description: Harness the power of the Voidblade to create rifts that draw in and annihilate enemies with dark energy.

special_perk.name: Void Rift
special_perk.description: Creates void rifts that pull in and damage enemies.

void_lance.name: Void Lance
void_lance.description: The Void Lance fires a concentrated beam of void energy, piercing through foes and sapping their defenses over time.

special_perk.name: Void Beam
special_perk.description: Fires a concentrated void beam that pierces through enemies, dealing damage over time and reducing their defenses.

ethereal_gauntlet.name: Ethereal Gauntlet
ethereal_gauntlet.description: The Ethereal Gauntlet conjures a void aura, mitigating damage taken and reflecting a portion back to assailants.

special_perk.name: Void Aura
special_perk.description: Generates a protective void aura that reduces incoming damage and reflects a portion back to attackers.
